user.title: Setup PVGIS Solar Forecast
user.description: Configure your solar installation location and weather source.

data_description.weather_entity: Select a weather entity to use for cloud coverage forecast. Leave empty to use clear-sky estimates only.

array.title: Add Solar Array
array.description: Configure a solar array. You can add multiple arrays.

data_description.modules_power: Total peak power of all solar modules in this array in kilowatts peak (kWp). For example, 10 panels of 400 Wp = 4.0 kWp.
data_description.loss: Sum of all system losses including cables, inverter, dirt, and other factors reducing the actual output compared to the nominal panel power.
